text: Ralf Schulenberg (born 15 August 1949) is a retired East German footballer. ==External links== * * * Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers Category:East German footballers Category:Footballers at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic footballers of East Germany Category:Olympic bronze medalists for East Germany Category:East Germany international footballers Category:FC Rot-Weiß Erfurt players Category:Berliner FC Dynamo players Category:Olympic medalists in football Category:DDR-Oberliga players Category:Medalists at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Erfurt Category:Association football forwards Category:Footballers from Thuringia
title: Ralf Schulenberg
